title: DBMS Level 6 â€” SQL Joins
intro: This level teaches how to combine data from multiple tables using joins.
points: Understand the need for joins when data is spread across tables.
INNER JOIN: get matching rows from both tables.
LEFT OUTER JOIN: get all rows from left table and matching from right.
RIGHT OUTER JOIN (concept) and FULL OUTER JOIN (where supported).
Use table aliases to make queries cleaner.
